macro.name: PORT
macro.description: Serial COM Port

macro.name: TEMP_1
macro.description: Card identifier for Temperature 1 (e.g. MB1.T1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: TEMP_2
macro.description: Card identifier for Temperature 2 (e.g. MB1.T1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: TEMP_3
macro.description: Card identifier for Temperature 3 (e.g. MB1.T1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: TEMP_4
macro.description: Card identifier for Temperature 4 (e.g. MB1.T1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: LEVEL_1
macro.description: Card identifier for Level 1 (e.g. DB1.L1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: LEVEL_2
macro.description: Card identifier for Level 2 (e.g. DB1.L1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: PRESSURE_1
macro.description: Card identifier for Pressure 1 (e.g. DB1.P1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: PRESSURE_2
macro.description: Card identifier for Pressure 2 (e.g. DB1.P1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_PRESSURE_1
macro.description: The index of the pressure card to control with flow software pressure control for temp1. Blank for no control.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_PRESSURE_2
macro.description: The index of the pressure card to control with flow software pressure control for temp2. Blank for no control.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_PRESSURE_3
macro.description: The index of the pressure card to control with flow software pressure control for temp3. Blank for no control.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_PRESSURE_4
macro.description: The index of the pressure card to control with flow software pressure control for temp4. Blank for no control.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_MIN_PRESSURE
macro.description: Software pressure control minimum pressure allowed.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_MAX_PRESSURE
macro.description: Software pressure control maximum pressure allowed.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_TEMP_DEADBAND
macro.description: Software pressure control deadband for the temperature and setpoint.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_OFFSET
macro.description: Software pressure control offset (extra pressuer to add before ramp down).

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_OFFSET_DURATION
macro.description: Software pressure control offset duration in minutes (time over which to ramp down).

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_GAIN
macro.description: Software pressure control offset gain for extra pressure based on how far away from set point the temperature is.

macro.name: FLOW_SPC_TABLE_FILE
macro.description: File to load to related temperature to pressure from calibration directory other_devices.

macro.name: VTI_SPC_PRESSURE_1
macro.description: The index of the pressure card to control with VTI software pressure control for temp1. Blank for no control.

macro.name: VTI_SPC_MIN_PRESSURE
macro.description: VTI software pressure control minimum pressure allowed.

macro.name: VTI_SPC_PRESSURE_CONSTANT
macro.description: VTI software pressure control constant pressure to use when below cutoff point.

macro.name: VTI_SPC_TEMP_CUTOFF_POINT
macro.description: VTI software pressure control temperature to switch between using a user-set constant and a linear interpolation function.
